channel.title: Setting up a proxy server on my site
channel.description:
How would I go about doing this?
I've researched a little about it, but I'm just looking for a decent program to install on my Linux operated server. If anyone knows anything about it, I'd love some feedback :D

item.title: Setting up a proxy server on my site
item.dc:creator: @Got_Shine Got_Shine
item.description:
@Got_Shine wrote:

Thanks, and check your pms jme

Read full topic
item.source: Setting up a proxy server on my site

item.title: Setting up a proxy server on my site
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

If you want a web proxy then use cgiproxy, it is opensource and free.
http://www.jmarshall.com/tools/cgiproxy/

It works really well, but some flash things dont work such as youtube videos.

Read full topic
item.source: Setting up a proxy server on my site
